name: Flight of the Valkyrie
description:
You are a valkyrie, a spirit whose responsibility is to watch over battle and determine who gets to move on and who is to be reincarnated to grow and mature more as a being.

In this battle that you're overseeing, the people in red uniforms are an authoritarian force, and the people in blue are struggling to resist.

Remember that it's important to be neutral, as we have no bearing on mortal affairs. The spirit you're replacing was terminated for breaking this rule.

WASD or arrows to move
Left click/ctrl to reincarnate a dead spirit
Right click/alt to allow a dead spirit to move on

This game is currently a work in progress.
